info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 3:27PM MDT until June 01 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL LEA COUNTY... At 326 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Maljamar, or 24 miles southwest of Lovington, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Chasers report ping pong ball sized hail west of Lovington. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hobbs, Lovington, Monument, Humble City, Maljamar, Lea County Regional Airport and Industrial Airpark. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
